catalog_info.title: Sculpture as Narrative: Studio Course
catalog_info.notes:
Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure. No previous studio experience necessary.
Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure.
catalog_info.description: A studio course that seeks to approach sculpture through narrative, exploring how different forms of narration might appear in sculpture or be used to suggest process.  Objects and stories might mutually influence each other or transform over time.  A sculptural installation, developed over the course of the semester, generates room for many meta-narratives, while a self-made publication will both document and fictionalize the work.
